Message Log¶

class scripts.ui.ui_elements.message_log.MessageLog(rect, manager)[source]¶

Bases: pygame_gui.core.ui_window.UIWindow

Hold text relating to the game’s events, to display to the player. Does not use UIWindow.

Parameters

  • rect (pygame.Rect) –

  • manager (pygame_gui.ui_manager.UIManager) –

update(time_delta)[source]¶

Update based on current state and data. Run every frame.

Parameters

time_delta (float) –

handle_events(event)[source]¶

Handle events created by this UI widget

add_message(message)[source]¶

Add message to the message log. Formatting the text is done via a subset of HTML tags. Currently supported tags are:

<b></b> or <strong></strong> - to encase bold styled text. <i></i>, <em></em> or <var></var> - to encase italic styled text. <u></u> - to encase underlined text. <a href=’id’></a> - to encase ‘link’ text that can be clicked on to generate events with the id given in href. <body bgcolor=’#FFFFFF’></body> - to change the background colour of encased text. <br> - to start a new line. <font face=’verdana’ color=’#000000’ size=3.5></font> - To set the font, colour and size of encased text.

Parameters

  • () (message) –

  • message (str) –
